name: Adventure Island II
description:
Master Higgins is back! Help him search through several uncharted islands for a missing Princess Tina! Grab a skateboard and thrash across savage lands filled with spiders, cobras, skeletons and more! Crack open monster eggs to free your dinosaur buddies - they'll give you a wild ride!

You'll explore the center of menacing volcanoes, dive deep into subterranean lakes and take to the skies on your quest. But look out for the hungry guardians of the untamed islands - they're waiting to make Master Higgins their next meal! Your search for Princess Tina will be an adventure of a lifetime!
